{"blocks":[{"key":"fehfq","text":"The sequencing ready library should be sequenced on any Illumina compatible sequencer, either Single-end or Paired-end, depending on the question and need.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a2dpi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6f1mt","text":"For final library whether gel cut/size selected or not, the expected median base-pair should be around or above 1kb. sequence_files:
  file1:
    name: /smartseq3/fastq/Undetermined_S0_R1_001.fastq.gz
    base_definition:
      - cDNA(23-150)
      - UMI(12-19)
    find_pattern: ATTGCGCAATG
  file2:
    name: /smartseq3/fastq/Undetermined_S0_R2_001.fastq.gz
    base_definition:
      - cDNA(1-150)
  file3:
    name: /smartseq3/fastq/Undetermined_S0_I1_001.fastq.gz
    base_definition:
      - BC(1-8)
  file4:
    name: /smartseq3/fastq/Undetermined_S0_I2_001.fastq.gz
    base_definition:
      - BC(1-8)
reference:
  STAR_index: /resources/genomes/Mouse/STAR5idx_noGTF/
  GTF_file: /resources/genomes/Mouse/Mus_musculus.GRCm38.91.gtf
  additional_STAR_params: '--clip3pAdapterSeq CTGTCTCTTATACACATCT'
  additional_files:
    - /resources/genomes/spikes/ERCC92.fa
out_dir: /smartseq3/zUMIs/
num_threads: 20
mem_limit: 50
filter_cutoffs:
  BC_filter:
    num_bases: 3
    phred: 20
  UMI_filter:
    num_bases: 2
    phred: 20
barcodes:
  barcode_num: ~
  barcode_file: /smartseq3/expected_barcodes.txt
  automatic: no
  BarcodeBinning: 1
  nReadsperCell: 100
  demultiplex: no
counting_opts:
  introns: yes
  downsampling: '0'
  strand: 0
  Ham_Dist: 1
  write_ham: no
  velocyto: no
  primaryHit: yes
  twoPass: yes
make_stats: yes
which_Stage: Filtering
samtools_exec: samtools
pigz_exec: pigz

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dji9v","text":"Insights into transcriptional bursting kinetics and regulation have emerged from real-time nascent RNA imaging and analyses of static RNA counts over cells. Here, we developed sensitive single-cell profiling of newly transcribed (or new) RNA in cells (NASC-seq2) that can easily be applied to tens of thousands of single cells to help shed new light on bursting dynamics and coordination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
